articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: Microsoft opens testing for Windows AI search - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is rolling out its Windows AI search feature to the Windows 11 Insider dev channel, with support for natural language search of certain file formats on Copilot Plus PCs.
